main event: A civilian reported observing a UFO in Salem, Ohio, on February 16, 1967.
interesting points: The observation lasted about 2 minutes with a clear visual of the object,No physical evidence was found or photographed,The report indicated there was insufficient data for scientific evaluation,Children were involved in the sighting, and they expressed fear about the object,The object was said to hover silently and appeared bright like a large star.
witness description: children who saw the object clearly
